channel.title: Ai Search on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ai Search on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Enough is enough—I dumped Google’s worsening search for Kagi
item.description: I like how the search engine is the product instead of me.

item.title: So far, only one-third of Americans have ever used AI for work
item.description: AP survey shows most Americans treat AI chatbots like a search engine replacement.

item.title: New Grok AI model surprises experts by checking Elon Musk’s views before answering
item.description: Grok 4’s “reasoning” shows cases where the chatbot consults Musk posts to answer divisive questions.
